General.Name: Wankai New Materials Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Wankai New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of polymer materials. It offers bottle grade PET chips used in manufacturing PET bottles and containers for drinking water, tea, juices, edible oil, cola, carbonated soft drinks, etc. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Haining City, China. Wankai New Materials Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Zhejiang Zhink Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No.15. Wenlan Road, Haining City, China, 314415
